magpie.user

Class InputFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.user.InputFileParser

  • public class InputFileParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses user input files. Contains operations that remove comments, blank lines, and combine words surrounded by quotation marks in order to supply the CommandHandler with clean commands. Can read from an input file or standard in (if no file is provided).

    Note: If a user input a "" from standard in, the program will exit. I haven't figured out how to fix and let the program exit when an EOF is return from command line.

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCommands()
